participant_1.name: Samantha
participant_1.personality: cheerful and determined, always striving to achieve her goals.
participant_1.background: i won homecoming queen this year. my current goal is to run a k. when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist. i am currently in high school.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: playful and quirky, always ready for adventure and fun.
participant_2.background: i like donuts. on weekends i do live action roleplaying events. i play a lot of call of duty. i drive a ford pinto. my favorite band is the insane clown posse.
